thread.section_title: W New York - Union Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location for this boutique Gem
thread.title_full: Great Location for this boutique Gem - Review of W New York - Union Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: richardj828
title: Great Location for this boutique Gem
text:
We arrived at 7am on a Friday and where accommodated with an early check in which was great having just flown in to NYC overnight. The room was neat and compact with ensuite bathroom to match. Beds where large and comfortable.
We where there for 3 nights over the weekend and unfortunately found the rest of the interaction with the front desk to be very inconsistent. There also seemed to be a complete disconnect with the restaurant / bar located on the ground floor off the lobby. It seemed that it was almost totally separated from the hotel.
Value for money its a great option that delivers a perfect place to stay in the area. If you're looking for great room service and attentive staff then this is not the space for you.
